Meg > MapEdit
Map Editor
Shortcuts Keys
0-9 keys - Change the Layer. F - Flip Selected Object. Space - Rotate Selected Object 90 degrees. Arrow Keys - Move Selected Object. Shift + Arrow Keys - Tile Selected Object.
Shift + Click - Continue adding object.

Display Object can be selected by double clicking or by pressing enter.
